snippet: Addressing matters of a pushy friend, a reluctant aunt, an absent skullcap and a boyfriend on autocorrect.
abstract: Philip Galanes Social Q's offers advice on handling pushy friends, aunt who does not support same-sex marriage, Orthodox Jewish business partner who skipped wearing his skullcap and teenager who constantly corrects his girlfriend's grammar.
lead_paragraph: Addressing matters of a pushy friend, a reluctant aunt, an absent skullcap and a boyfriend on autocorrect.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
